name: Donut on the Loose, in Space
name_original: Donut on the Loose, in Space
description:
Use the arrow keys to move. Press space to fire. Follow the green arrow to reach your destination.

If the donut hits the buttons on the top right miniscreen, your weapon will be turned off. Get the donut to hit the buttons again to turn the weapon back on. When all buttons are green, the weapon is activated.
